original_text: The person who sat there shone with bright red and white light, like jewels called jasper and ruby. Around the throne there was a rainbow that shone with bright green light like an emerald jewel.
korean_text: 앉으신 이의 모양이 벽옥과 홍보석 같고 또 무지개가 있어 보좌에 둘렸는데 그 모양이 녹보석 같더라

sentences.original_text: The person who sat there shone
with bright red and white light
like jewels called jasper and ruby
Around the throne there was a rainbow
that shone with bright green light
